channel.title: Nmap on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Nmap on TLDRBins

item.title: LDAP
item.description: Enum ldapsearch ldapdomaindump nmap # Get domain base ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -s base namingcontexts # Get all from domain ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # Just get a class (e.g. person) ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' '(objectClass=person)' # With creds ldapsearch -x -H ldap://<TARGET> -D "CN=<USER>,CN=Users,DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>" -w '<PASSWORD>' -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # With creds ldapdomaindump -u '<DOMAIN>\<USER>' -p '<PASSWORD>' <TARGET> -o ./ldap # Using nmap script sudo nmap -p 389 --script ldap-search <TARGET> Enum with Kerberos ldapsearch nxc # Add GSSAPI sudo apt install libsasl2-modules-gssapi-mit ldapsearch -H ldap://<TARGET> -Y GSSAPI -b 'DC=<EXAMPLE>,DC=<COM>' # With kerberos nxc ldap <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -k --users

item.title: Nmap
item.description: Nmap Scan TCP UDP Script target=<TARGET> nmap -p- --min-rate 10000 -oA ./nmap-alltcp $target ports=$(cat nmap-alltcp.nmap| grep -Eo "^[0-9]+" | tr '\n' ',' | sed -r 's/,$//') nmap -p $ports -sCV -oA ./nmap-tcpscripts $target target=<TARGET> nmap -sU --min-rate 10000 -oA ./nmap-udp $target ports=$(cat nmap-udp.nmap| grep -Eo "^[0-9]+" | tr '\n' ',' | sed -r 's/,$//') nmap -p $ports -sU -sCV -oA ./nmap-udpscripts $target Update scripts DB nmap --script-updatedb Search scripts # e.

item.title: SMB Enum
item.description: SMB Share Enum nmap sudo nmap --script=smb-enum-shares -p 445 <TARGET> Anonymous Login smbmap smbclient impacket smbmap -H <TARGET> --no-banner smbmap -H <TARGET> -u null --no-banner # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ # After found an accessible share smbclient -N \\\\<TARGET>\\<SHARE>\\ # Fix: Unable to initialize messaging context. protocol negotiation failed: NT_STATUS_CONNECTION_DISCONNECTED smbclient -N -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ --option='client min protocol=NT1' # SID brute, if null auth allowed impacket-lookupsid test@<DOMAIN> -no-pass Authenticated smbmap smbclient smbmap -H <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' # List known share smbmap -H <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -R <SHARE> # Download file smbmap -H <TARGET> -r <SHARE> --download <PATH_TO_FILE> # List files with regex pattern smbmap -H <TARGET> -u <USER> -p '<PASSWORD>' -r <SHARE> -A <FILE_PATTERN> smbclient -L \\\\<TARGET>\\ -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' # After found an accessible share smbclient \\\\<TARGET>\\<SHARE>\\ -U '<DOMAIN>/<USER>%<PASSWORD>' Authenticated with Kerberos impacket impacket-smbclient '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' -k -no-pass Basic commands # List all files in a share recurse ON ls # Download all files mask "" recurse ON prompt OFF mget * List Alternate Data Streams (ADS) allinfo <FILE> # Example Response >>>stream: [:Password:$DATA], 15 bytes # Download specific data stream get "<FILE>:Password" Mount SMB Share Anonymous Authenticated sudo mount -t cifs //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt sudo mount -t cifs -o ro,user=<USER>,password='<PASSWORD>' //<TARGET>/<SHARE> /mnt Check write permission sudo find .

item.title: SMTP
item.description: Simple Mail Debugging Server #!/usr/bin/env python3 import aiosmtpd.controller class CustomSMTPHandler: async def handle_DATA(self, server, session, envelope): print(f"[+] Received a mail.") print("=" * 50) print(envelope.content.decode()) print("=" * 50) return "250 OK" handler = CustomSMTPHandler() server = aiosmtpd.controller.Controller(handler, hostname="0.0.0.0", port=25) server.start() print("[*] Listening on 0.0.0.0:25") input("[*] Server started. Press Return to quit.\n") server.stop() Users Enum nmap script smtp-user-enum nmap -p 25 --script=smtp-enum-users <TARGET> # Use RCPT smtp-user-enum -M RCPT -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/cirt-default-usernames.txt -t <TARGET> # Use VRFY smtp-user-enum -M VRFY -U /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/cirt-default-usernames.
